group_1.narration: "I found them in places where we stopped trouble,@and as far as I can tell, they come in three sizes:@small, medium, and large."
"They contain magical power...@And come to think of it,@non-Magical Girls couldn't see them."

group_1.textLeft: I have lots of questions, but let's go through@them one at a time...
First of all, can you remember the precise@locations where you found them?

group_1.textRight: Like close to something...or...

group_1.textLeft: Ah...! The small seeds...
They were stuck to Manaka!

group_1.textRight: To me?

group_1.textLeft: Also, on Kanoko-senpai, Sayuki-senpai, and@the arch!

group_1.textRight: Now that you mention it...

group_1.textLeft: The medium ones were...
In the box of candy in Mayu-senpai's class...
And I think they fell from above the classroom@where the fire detector malfunctioned?

group_1.textRight: ...I found the large seeds in the boxes of@skewers.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hey, are they at the center of all the trouble...?

group_1.textRight: Hold on a second!
That would imply I was the center of that@problem, wouldn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Didn't you say you were the one who came@up with the mushroom idea?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I did.

group_1.textLeft: I came up with the ideas for my class, too!

group_1.textRight: Sayuki was the center of the disturbance...

group_1.textLeft: Not to mention the boxes of skewers and@the arch!

group_1.textRight: And the candy...

group_1.textLeft: When you said it fell from above...@Do you mean from the fire detector?
I knew it, these seeds are suspicious!
Raise your hands if you think so too!

group_1.textRight: Based on what we've heard so far, I don't think@this is all of the seeds...

group_1.textLeft: Considering the number of reports the@committee has received...
There's a good chance there's still many left...!

group_1.textRight: If these are the cause, we can't just leave@them lying around...! We have to collect them!

group_1.textLeft: That's right.
It would be terrible if anyone got hurt while@constructing the stalls or stage...
There might still be some seeds left, and a clue@to the culprit of the threatening letter...
Let's split up and search for them!

group_1.textRight: By the way, how are we supposed to sneak in?
We can't exactly just waltz in through the gates,@can we?

group_1.textLeft: Leave that to me, I've already secured a way in.

group_1.textRight: Ummm...I'm a little nervous about walking@around the school at night by myself...

group_1.textLeft: Yeaaah...I'm scared of school at night, too...

group_1.textRight: ...*Sigh*...@Even though we fight Witches every day...

group_1.textLeft: Then...let's split into three teams!
Because it's just right!

group_1.textRight: Just right...?
So the security cameras had such a blind spot...@How did you know about this?

group_1.textLeft: ...Well...various things happened...

group_1.textCenter: Now that we've successfully broken into the@school, let's announce the teams!

group_1.narration: "In charge of the new school building...@Team Small Seeds!"
"In charge of the old school building...@Team Medium Seeds!"
"And us, in charge of the schoolyard,@gymnasium, and other exterior areas...@Team Big Seeds!"

group_1.textRight: I'm not complaining about the grouping,@but can we drop those team names...?

group_1.narration: "Go around to the places where@there was trouble and collect the seeds!@And look for clues to the culprit!"

group_1.textLeft: And when we're done, we'll meet back here!
We need to work together...
Hey, wasn't someone there just now?!

group_1.textRight: Where?!

group_1.textLeft: Over there!@[chara:302401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302401:cheek_0][chara:302401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302401:lipSynch_1]But, they ran off...

group_1.textRight: Which direction did they go?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know, it's too dark...

group_1.textRight: Has the criminal returned to the scene of@the crime?
...No, I shouldn't jump to conclusions so easily...

group_1.textLeft: Whichever the case may be, we should@remain vigilant.

group_1.textCenter: But if the culprit is here, it's a good thing!
Collect seeds and evidence!@And find the culprit...
Let's confront them with the evidence and@settle this straight away!
